name: The Double Eye-Patched Man
description:
Made with Aero!Ink
Game made in 2 hours for 1HGJ #291 under the theme "Color Blind" 

Collect crystals to make the colored platforms exist!

Controls:

  • Space to jump
  • Right Arrow, or D to run right
  • Left Arrow, A or Q to run left
  • R to reset
  • Escape to close

Music: Bleeping Demo by Kevin MacLeod under CC BY
